General.Name: Ebara Jitsugyo Co.Ltd
General.Description: Ebara Jitsugyo Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells environment and related products in Japan. The company also offers zone-related equipment and devices, such as ozone concentration meters, ozone air sterilization, deodorizing equipment, ozone generators, physics and chemistry machinery, and other measuring and analytical instruments. In addition, it offers deodorizing equipment and deodorizers; waste liquid, waste recycling, waste sorting, and waste treatment equipment; cultivation and fisheries equipment; engineering business of environmental improvement and sanitation facilities, such as water supply, sewage, cleaning, water treatment, agricultural and fishery settlement wastewater treatment facilities, industrial wastewater, waste liquid treatment facilities, and industrial water supply. Further, it involves in manufacturing and sales of electrical machinery and equipment, such as pumps, blowers, compressors, refrigeration, air conditioning equipment, boilers, power receiving and transforming, and electrical instrumentation; contracting and construction of civil engineering, construction, electricity, pipes, steel structures, painting, installation of machinery and equipment, and other construction work; operations related to the investigation, remediation, and improvement of soil contamination; antique dealer; sales of industrial chemicals; manufacturing and sales of feed and organic fertilizers; leasing and management of real estate; general leasing and rental business; industrial waste disposal business; and worker dispatching business. Ebara Jitsugyo Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
